attributes.comment:
There is absolutely no way it is acceptable to raise adoption prices. The number
of children needing homes is outrageous, and our ability as Americans to help the
crisis should not be hindered by fees and financial struggle. We have enough
issues in our country with debt that we should not force good hearted and well
intentioned persons to incur further debt to rescue a child from an orphanage in a
destitute country. Why would we make it harder for someone to save a life? The
idea of raising fees (especially at this rate) is ludicrous. Please make one
decision that will save lives all over the world.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Carissa M
